NAME: Brijesh Modi
ABOUT:
My 19 years experience as a Chartered Accountant  includes Strategy, Business Partnering, Commercial, Accounting, Audits, Controlling, taxation, treasury, Administration.
As a CFO of the company, I have successfully partnered with MD & CEOs in the turnaround of the company. 
Revamped finance & administration functions. Culture changed, perception changed, vision and values launched. A dedicated Business Partnering culture enabled the company to improve its bottom-line. Controlling was strengthened. Talent management completed and brought speed in execution. Have formalised a GRC unit in the company.
Successfully managed the complex sale of the company to the new shareholder in the capacity as SPOC and then led the process of shareholder change from Finance and compliance side.
 Led the corporate restructuring initiatives such as hive-off of non-core unit, merger of a core unit from the company, buyback of shares leading to value maximisation.
Exhibited strong communication, negotiation, perseverance, conflict management, analytical & people management skills which gave tangible benefits to the company. 
 Worked with loss making to profit making companies, Foreign MNC (UK & Swiss)  to Indian MNC, listed to private limited companies, B2B to B2C business models, strategic shareholder to private equity, shared service set-up, automobile to tourism to foreign exchange industries. I have worked at a divisional level as well as at a corporate level.
I have worked directly with Board Chairman and dealt with Audit Committee Chairman. I have managed Board Meetings and Audit committee meetings. Worked with foreign bosses and managed an ex-pat Swiss subordinate. 
Was awarded a title of India’s one of the 100 influential CFOs by CIMA in 2015. I am the recipient of Roll of Honour title twice & have got Fellowship Award for Excellence twice from my employers.
